將.definition: to desire; to invite; to request

將今論古.definition: to observe the present to study the past

將伯之助.definition: assistance that one gets from another

將來.definition: in the future; future; the future; CL:個|个[ge4]

將功折罪.definition: see 將功贖罪|将功赎罪[jiang1 gong1 shu2 zui4]

將功補過.definition: to make up for one's faults by doing good deeds (idiom)

將功贖罪.definition: to atone for one's crimes by meritorious acts

將勤補拙.definition: (idiom) to compensate for lack of ability with hard work

將就.definition: to accept (a bit reluctantly); to put up with

將帥.definition: commander-in-chief, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess

將心比心.definition: to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)

將會.definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to); will (cause); should (enable); going to

將樂.definition: Jiangle, a county in Sanming City 三明市[San1ming2 Shi4], Fujian

將樂縣.definition: Jiangle, a county in Sanming City 三明市[San1ming2 Shi4], Fujian

將死.definition: to checkmate (in chess); to be about to die

將至.definition: to be about to arrive; to be around the corner

將要.definition: will; shall; to be going to

將計就計.definition: to beat sb at their own game (idiom)

將軍.definition: general; high-ranking military officer; to check or checkmate; fig. to embarrass; to challenge; to put sb on the spot

將錯就錯.definition: lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake; to accept an error and adapt to it; to muddle through
